Product Manager Job at Chez Resources Pharmaceuticals Limited




        
    

        
        Chez Resources Pharmaceuticals Limited is a pharmaceutical company specializing in the marketing of generic and proprietary branded pharmaceutical products. In prescription drugs category, Chez ranks among the top 20 pharmaceutical companies in Nigeria with a range of products numbering over 60 and nearly a decade and half experience in the pharmaceutical industry. The company enjoys a firmly established national and international presence, operating through a carefully tailored network of presence in Nigeria, with corporate headquarter in Onitsha, Anambra state.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Product Manager
Job Location: Onitsha, Anambra
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Requirements
The ideal candidate:


	Must be very sound and articulate with B.Pharm Degree or B.Sc in any of the following courses Microbiology, Biochemistry, Physiology and Biological Science.
	Must have minimum 2 years of field experience in Pharmaceutical Sales and Marketing
	Must be a self determined individual.
	Must have sound statistical knowledge with excellent use of MS excel and Power point.
	Must be resident in Onitsha or willing to relocate at his cost.
	Must be able to conceptualize, develop, articulate and implement marketing strategies that guaranties sales promotion and growth
	Must have sound product knowledge and excellent presentation skills..
	Not more than 35 years as at December, 2024.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: competenthands2018@gmail.com using "PRODUCT MANAGER" as the subject of the email.

Note: Only qualified and shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Program Officer Job at Grand Africa Initiative (GAIN)




        
    

        
        Grand Africa Initiative (GAIN) is a Pan-African Non-governmental organization helping African young men and women, between 15 and 35 years, develop and harness their unique ideas, talents and abilities for success in education, entrepreneurship, innovation and employment. We train, mentor and empower African youth with digital, leadership, employability and entrepreneurial skills for self-sustenance and professional growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Posittion: Program Officer
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a dedicated and detail-oriented Program Officer to support the planning, implementation, and monitoring of Youth development programs.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, coordinate, and implement programs and projects
	Monitor program activities to ensure timely and effective delivery
	Prepare program plans, budgets, and progress reports
	Coordinate with partners, stakeholders, and field teams to ensure program success
	Track program outcomes and support impact evaluation
	Maintain accurate program documentation and records
	Support compliance with donor and organizational requirements
	Identify challenges and recommend improvements to program delivery


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Public Health, Social Sciences, Project Management, Development Studies, or a related field
	Minimum of 3 years of relevant work experience in program coordination, project management, or NGO operations
	Strong organizational, planning, and reporting skills
